verses.content: Chun, aisân pahnina chu Simeon chungah, Simeon thla- hai hnam chungah an sûngkuo izir ang peiin a tlu tah a; an chanpuol chu Juda thlahai chanpuol lai khan a ṭhang ve a nih.
An chanpuola tluhai chu, Beer- seba, Seba, Molada,
Hazar-sual, Bala, Ezem,
Eltolad, Bethul, Horma,
Ziklag, Beth-markaboth, Hazar- susa,
Beth-lebaoth le Saruhen, khaw- pui sâwmpathum a khaw chînhai leh.
Ain, Rimmon, Ether le Asan; khawpui pali a khaw chînhai leh;
chuong khawpui vêla khaw chîn- hai po po Baalath-beer, simtienga Ramah chenin. Chuong chu a nih Simeon thlahai hnam an sûngkuo izir ang peia an chanpuola ruot chu.
Simeon thlahai chanpuol chu Juda thlahai chanpuol laia mi a nih; Juda thlahai chanpuol chu anni ta dingin a lien taluo sih a; chuleiin, Simeon thlahai chanpuol chu an chan lai khan a ṭhang ve a nih.
Chun, aisân pathumna chu Zebulun thlahai chungah an sûngkuo izir ang peiin a tlu tah a; an chanpuol ramri chu Sarid chenin a nih;
chun, an ramri chu thlangtieng pangah Marala tlung zakin a fe pei a; Dabbeseth a va tlung a, chun, Jokneam saka vadungte a va tlung a;
Sarida inthawkin saktieng pangah nisa suokna tieng pangah Kisloth-tabor ramri chenin a hang kâwi a; Daberathah a suok a, Japhiaa chun a fe pei a;
chun, chutaka inthawk chun saktieng pangah Gitta-hepher le Eth- kazinah a fe pei a; Nea tieng panin Rimmonah a suok a;
chun, ramri chu hmârtienga chun Hannathon-ah ân kuol phei a, Iphtahel ruomah a suok a,
chun, Kattath, Nahalal, Sim- ron, Idala le Bethlehem; khawpui sâwmpahni a khaw chînhai leh.
Chuong chu a nih Zebulun thlahai an sûngkuo izir ang peia an chanpuola ruot chu; chuong khawpui- hai le a khaw chînhai chu.
Aisân palina chu Issakar chungah, Issakar thlahai an sûngkuo izir ang peiin a tlu tah a;
an ramri chin chu Jezreel, Kesulloth le Sunem,
Hapharaim Sion, Anaharath,
Rabbith, Kision, Ebez;
Remeth, En-gannim, En-hadda le Beth-pazez chenin a nih;
ramri chu Tabor, Sahazuma le Beth-semes a va tlung a nih; chuong- chun, an ramri suokna chu Jordanah a nih; khawpui sâwmparuk, a khaw chînhai leh.
Chuong chu a nih Issakar thlahai hnam an sûngkuo izir ang peia an chanpuola ruot chu, khaw- puihai le a khaw chînhai chu.
Aisân pangana chu Aser thlahai hnam chungah an sûngkuo izir ang peiin a tlu tah a.
An ramri chin chu Helkath, Hali, Beten, Aksaph,
Allammelek, Amad le Misal an nih; thlangtieng panga chun Karmel le Sihor-libnath a zu tlung a;
chun, nisa suokna tieng panga chun Beth-dagonah an kuol a, chun, Zebulun le hmârtieng pangah Iphtah- el ruomah Bethemek le Neiel a va tlung a, chun, hmârtieng panga chun fe peiin Kabul,
Ebron, Rehob, Hammon, Kana le Sidon ropui tlung zakin a fe pei a;
chun, ramri chu Ramaa le Tura khawpui kul neia chun ân kuol phei a; chun, ramri chu Hosaah ân kuol phei pei a, chuongchun, Akzib ram tuisuorietah a suok a.
Umma, Aphek le Rehob, khaw sâwmhni pahni le a khaw chînhai leh,
Chuong chu a nih Aser thlahai hnam an sûngkuo izir ang peia an chanpuol chu, chuong khawpuihai le a khaw chînhai chu.
Aisân parukna chu Naphtali thlahai chungah an sûngkuo izir ang pei bawkin Naphtali thlahai chung ngeiah a tlu tah a.
An ramri chin chu Helepha inthawk dâm, Zanannima thingsai- suoa inthawk dâm, Adami-nekeb le Jabneela inthawka Lakkum chenin a nih; chun, a suokna chu Jordanah a nih;

chun, ramri chu thlangtieng panga chun Aznoth-taborah a fe thlah a; chutaka inthawkin Hukkok- ah a feh a; chun, simtienga chun Zebulun a va tlung a, thlangtienga chun Aser a tlung a, chun, nisa suokna tienga chun Juda rama Jordan a hang tlung a.
Chun, khawpui kul nei mihai chu Ziddim, Zer, Hammath, Rakkath, Kinnereth,
Adama, Rama, Hazor,
Kedes, Edrei, En-hazor,
Iron, Migdal-el, Horem, Beth- anath le Beth-semes an nih; khawpui sâwmpakuo a khaw chînhai leh,
Chuong chu a nih Naphtali thlahai hnam an sûngkuo izir ang peia an chanpuol chu, khawpuihai le a khaw chînhai chu.
Aisân pasarina chu Dan thlahai hnam chungah an sûngkuo izir ang peiin a tlu tah a.
An chanpuol ramri chu Zora, Estaol, Ir-semes,
Saalabin, Aijalon, Ithla,
Elon, Timna, Ekron,
Elteke, Gibbethon, Baalat,
Jehud, Bene-berak, Gath- rimmon,
Me-jarkon, Rakkon, Joppa dep ramhai le khan an nih.

Dan thlahai ramri chun chuong chu a va khêl a, Dan thlahai chun Lesem an hang do a, an lâk a, kâwl- hnâmin an sukbohmang a, an nei tah a; chutaka chun an um nghâl ta a, an pu Dan hming chu chawi- in Lesem chu Dan an lo inbûk tah a nih.
Chuong chu a nih Dan thlahai hnam an sûngkuo izir ang peia an chanpuol chu, chuong khawpuihai le a khaw chînhai le chun.
Chuongchun, an chanpuol ding anga ramri siem ang peiin ram chu an lo sem zo tah a; chuongchun, Israel thlahai chun Nun naupa Josua chu anni lai chanpuol an siempêk veh a;
LALPA thupêk angin Ephraim tlâng rama a khawpui hni Timnath- Sera khuo chu an pêk a; chun, khawpui chu a siem ṭha a, chutaka chun a um tah a.

Chuonghai chu a nih thiempu Eleazar hai, Nun naupa Josua hai le Israel thlahai hnam sûngkuo upahai- in Siloa LALPA hmaa inbiekna puon in kawtkhâra aisâna an rochan dinga an lo sempêk tahai chu, chuongchun, ram ṭhe chu an zo tah a nih.
